headline: A Look At First Solar (FSLR) Valuation After Jefferies Downgrade And Booking Concerns
summary: First Solar (FSLR) is back in focus after a Jefferies downgrade from Buy to Hold, which coincided with a sharp single-day drop as investors reacted to concerns around bookings, guidance and margins. See our latest analysis for First Solar. The Jefferies downgrade comes after a solid run for First Solar, with a 1 year total shareholder return of 26.15% and a 5 year total shareholder return of 131.44%. At the same time, recent 1 day and 7 day share price returns of 10.29% and 7.70% highlight...

headline: Supreme Court Showdown: 2 Stocks Poised for a Trump Tariff Triumph
summary: President Donald Trump announced sweeping tariffs on April 2, 2025, dubbing the date Liberation Day. The executive order imposed a 10% baseline tariff on imports from nearly all countries starting Apr. 5, with higher country-specific rates to follow for Apr. 9. This triggered a global market crash, with the S&P 500 dropping more than 12% ... Supreme Court Showdown: 2 Stocks Poised for a Trump Tariff Triumph

headline: Is It Worth Investing in First Solar (FSLR) Based on Wall Street's Bullish Views?
summary: The average brokerage recommendation (ABR) for First Solar (FSLR) is equivalent to a Buy. The overly optimistic recommendations of Wall Street analysts make the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric questionable. So, is it worth buying the stock?

headline: First Solar (FSLR) Is Down 7.7% After Jefferies Downgrade On Weaker Bookings And Cancellations
summary: In recent days, Jefferies cut its rating on First Solar from buy to hold, flagging weaker bookings and repeated guidance reductions tied to customer project cancellations amid softer policy support than once hoped. This shift highlights how company-specific contract risks can challenge even a solar manufacturer benefiting from strong sector momentum and earlier operational progress. Next, we’ll examine how this downgrade and its focus on bookings and cancellations may reshape First Solar’s...
